notes.text: I had trouble this month running  Ninjas and Restart CA, I made it to Legend 3 a couple times but couldnâ€™t quite make the final push and ended up bouncing up and down. I ended up with this and it got me an easy finish from Legend 2 straight to KOG. The instant pin was the MVP.  Without mindscan to see backrow,  Fire Formation-Gyokkou made it so I could go super aggressive. Running Bandit Keith Balance threw some people off thinking I was running GB. Deck credit to @Valtheras
